question: In a real time system the computer results ____________
options: ['a) must be produced within a specific deadline period', 'b) may be produced at any time', 'c) may be correct', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) must be produced within a specific deadline period
option2: b) may be produced at any time

question: In a safety critical system, incorrect operation ____________
options: ['a) does not affect much', 'b) causes minor problems', 'c) causes major and serious problems', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option3: c) causes major and serious problems

question: Antilock brake systems, flight management systems, pacemakers are examples of ____________
options: ['a) safety critical system', 'b) hard real time system', 'c) soft real time system', 'd) safety critical system  and hard real time system']
option4: d) safety critical system  and hard real time system

question: In a ______ real time system, it is guaranteed that critical real time tasks will be completed within their deadlines
options: ['a) soft', 'b) hard', 'c) critical', 'd) none of the mentioned']

question: Some of the properties of real time systems include ____________
options: ['a) single purpose', 'b) inexpensively mass produced', 'c) small size', 'd) all of the mentioned']

question: The amount of memory in a real time system is generally ____________
options: ['a) less compared to PCs', 'b) high compared to PCs', 'c) same as in PCs', 'd) they do not have any memory']
option4: d) they do not have any memory

question: What is the priority of a real time task?
options: ['a) must degrade over time', 'b) must not degrade over time', 'c) may degrade over time', 'd) none of the mentioned']
option2: b) must not degrade over time

question: Memory management units ____________
options: ['a) increase the cost of the system', 'b) increase the power consumption of the system', 'c) increase the time required to complete an operation', 'd) all of the mentioned']
option1: a) increase the cost of the system
option2: b) increase the power consumption of the system
option3: c) increase the time required to complete an operation

question: The technique in which the CPU generates physical addresses directly is known as ____________
options: ['a) relocation register method', 'b) real addressing', 'c) virtual addressing', 'd) none of the mentioned']
